name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"7cbb2059-7c70-4314-9d53-215b03ff179b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: resolve_call","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6353dca5-4d26-40ab-b16d-abd230f391d5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"resolve_call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is the internal detective of the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_Call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" process. Its single purpose is to identify ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"what","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is being executed when a call expression occurs. Because Python is dynamic, a call like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" could refer to a function, a class (instantiation), a lambda, or even an object implementing ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__call__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This function analyzes the syntax tree to track down the specific Definition object(s) that the call targets.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1ebaded9-6659-4cab-ab38-04d44d264822","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"You cannot analyze a function call if you don't know which function is running.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"36169719-e6ff-4151-838a-00174675f3fb","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"In ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"print("hello")","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the target is the built-in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"print","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4305c185-bb0b-448b-af0d-7e95af4d5e0a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"In ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user.save()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the target depends on what class ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is an instance of.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d2d835e9-f6fd-44f2-a57a-c3717743f705","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"In ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"factory()()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the target is the return value of another function. Without ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"resolve_call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" accurately identifying these targets, the dependency graph (Call Graph) would be empty, and parameter mapping would be impossible.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"febbaf14-bf68-4008-a193-e21a388879ed","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"93dd3a75-34b6-4153-bf4f-00d7ab763f8c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Decorator vs. Standard Call:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It checks a flag (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"decorator","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") to see if it's resolving a normal function call or a decorator being applied to a function definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1856c457-8dcb-48df-b3f7-2bfb911bdae1","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Simple Names (","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"func()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"):","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"90b20bee-206a-4c8d-b719-724961f5853f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It checks if the name is a Python built-in (like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"len","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"range","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). If so, it ensures a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"BUILTIN","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" definition exists.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2a5e3042-cad7-4c01-84ff-64195b22c13f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If not, it looks up the name in the current scope using ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"scope_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It traces that variable back to its definition (using ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"getYPOint","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") to find the actual function object.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"576d0089-e0be-41f1-8013-0657bccf25aa","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Attributes (","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"obj.method()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"):","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"e92159c0-1059-4de3-8d3e-eede66968451","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It resolves the "owner" object (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"obj","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). For example, resolving ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"User","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b242e01b-c5cd-4743-bcdf-15a60f7feb42","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It searches that owner for the specific field (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"method","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c7608df0-40bb-4a67-8ccd-4fb6024d5114","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It specifically handles dictionary methods like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"update","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". If it detects ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"dict.update({...})","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it attempts to merge the new keys/values directly into the dictionary's definition model.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"48f9ddd9-4860-4349-a1a1-823489984ef3","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Chained Calls (","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"f()()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"):","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"abf451ef-d7ff-4754-9dcb-286b11b25916","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the call target is itself a call node, it recursively resolves the inner call first to find the return value, then treats that return value as the function to be called next.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"3106fd66-7486-4565-9fe8-3fbeb78baaf6","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Code:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"09340f44-1121-4eb1-8ca9-5ef2d3f2a2f7","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"my_list.append(1)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8049fa01-9063-477e-9031-a9224d1b1cc7","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"resolve_call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" sees an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Attribute","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" node: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"my_list.append","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"17b8bdbe-9d29-4b88-84dc-53652aa75a8b","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It decodes ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"my_list","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". The analyzer finds it is defined as a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"LIST_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (List).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e7aba633-3246-4b1d-9dca-47329be0247e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It looks for the field ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"append","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" on the List type.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"66c9886d-fd50-4733-869f-27e003aba71f","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It finds the built-in definition for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"list.append","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"428037d4-7a31-44d3-9eab-abc5621f95e8","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It returns a list containing the namespace for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"list.append","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", allowing the analyzer to link this call to the standard library definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a7d8b082-e04c-4d7f-b21d-707cbccdcbb5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
